channel.title: on smaller infinity
channel.description: Recent content in on smaller infinity

item.title: First Post
item.description: Wow. Starting this with something named “First Post” inspires my “paralysis by analysis” response in a big way. For example, I just spent thirty seconds thinking about whether to change “inspires my” above to something else. My name Seth McCarthy. I currently manage a software development team at BIOVIA, a brand of Dassault Systemes. For a long time I haven’t done anything technical outside of my job. It hasn’t been for lack of interest, just for lack of white-space in my schedule.
